field.name: Altitude
field.description: Altitude, feet -- Depends on altitude mode.

field.name: Calibration Mode
field.description: Returns code based on success, error = (1:accel),(2:gyro),(3 : both)

field.name: UniqueID
field.description: A unique command ID to prevent executing duplicate commands

field.name: EleDown
field.description: Maximum elevator, trailing edge down output (us)

field.name: EleUp
field.description: Maximum elevator, trailing edge up output (us)

message.name: Servo config payload
message.description: Set payload PWM output servo pulse widths (microseconds) DO NOT CHANGE IN-FLIGHT.

message.name: Payload Output
message.description: Sets the PWM output for channels 4,5,6,7

field.name: OutputPacketId
field.description: Used to avoid applying the same pwm output multiple times in the event of packet retries.

field.name: reset
field.description: Specifies whether the vehicle should update it's current waypoint to 0, or continue where it was at with the modified FP

count.name: number_of_waypoints
count.description: The number of waypoints in flightpath

field.name: loiter_time
field.description: The loiter time for the waypoint if loiter_mode is time

field.name: Arrival Range (ft)
field.description: Arrival range in feet for waypoints

field.name: RTL Minimum Altitude (ft AGL)
field.description: Aircraft will rise to this altitude during RTL if below it

field.name: Takeoff Complete
field.description: Detects if the aircraft has left the ground

field.name: Flight Detected
field.description: Detects if the appears to be flying

field.name: UniqueID
field.description: A unique command ID to prevent executing duplicate commands

field.name: High-Rate Logging Frequency
field.description: Frequency to send high-rate logging data, if a source is selected. In Hertz.

field.name: High-Rate Logging Source

enum.choice: Fixed Climb Rate to Pitch PID

field.description: Source to send to the Debug Report

field.name: Approach airspeed
field.description: Airspeed from traffic pattern to runway alignment [knots]

field.name: AutonomousFlag
field.description: Boolean indicating whether the vehicle is under manual or autonomous control (0=manual, 1=auto)

field.name: EPitchRate
field.description: The average amount of error in the PID controller

field.name: ERollRate
field.description: The average amount of error in the PID controller

field.name: EYawRate
field.description: The average amount of error in the PID controller

field.name: EPitch
field.description: The average amount of error in the PID controller

field.name: ERoll
field.description: The average amount of error in the PID controller

field.name: EAltitude
field.description: The average amount of error in the PID controller

field.name: EGPSNorth
field.description: The average amount of error in the PID controller

field.name: EGPSEast
field.description: The average amount of error in the PID controller

field.name: Average FCS Time
field.description: The average amount of time it takes the FCS to execute

field.name: Max FCS Time
field.description: The maximum amount of time it has taken the FCS to execute recently

field.name: Uptime
field.description: How long the system has been running continuously

field.name: Accel X Vib
field.description: The average magnitude of output from the sensor

field.name: Accel Y Vib
field.description: The average magnitude of output from the sensor

field.name: Accel Z Vib
field.description: The average magnitude of output from the sensor

field.name: Gyro X Vib
field.description: The average magnitude of output from the sensor

field.name: Gyro Y Vib
field.description: The average magnitude of output from the sensor

field.name: Gyro Z Vib
field.description: The average magnitude of output from the sensor
The loiter time for the waypoint if loiter_mode is time

field.name: Crosstrack Angle
field.description: Angle relative to the current heading to get back no the path

field.name: Crosstrack North Dist Adj
field.description: North distance adjustment based on crosstrack

field.name: Crosstrack East Dist Adj
field.description: East distance adjustment based on crosstrack

message.name: FCS Heading To Roll Parameters
message.description: Set FCS Heading to Roll Control Parameters

field.name: lowpass_frequency
field.description: cutoff frequency of the LPF applied to the input of the PID controller

field.name: padding
field.description: Padding to force alignment in GCS window

message.name: FCS Climb Rate to Pitch Parameters
message.description: Set FCS Climb Rate to Pitch Control Parameters

field.name: lowpass_frequency
field.description: cutoff frequency of the LPF applied to the input of the PID controller

field.name: padding
field.description: Padding to force alignment in GCS window

message.name: FCS Roll to Aileron parameters
message.description: Set FCS Roll to Aileron Control Parameters

field.name: lowpass_frequency
field.description: cutoff frequency of the LPF applied to the input of the PID controller

field.name: padding
field.description: Padding to force alignment in GCS window

message.name: FCS Pitch to Elevator Parameters
message.description: Set FCS Pitch to Elevator Control Parameters

field.name: lowpass_frequency
field.description: cutoff frequency of the LPF applied to the input of the PID controller

field.name: padding
field.description: Padding to force alignment in GCS window

message.name: FCS Airspeed to Throttle Parameters
message.description: Set FCS Airspeed to Throttle Control Parameters

field.name: lowpass_frequency
field.description: cutoff frequency of the LPF applied to the input of the PID controller

field.name: padding
field.description: Padding to force alignment in GCS window

message.name: Runway heading to heading rate parameters
message.description: Set runway heading to heading rate parameters

field.name: lowpass_frequency
field.description: cutoff frequency of the LPF applied to the input of the PID controller

field.name: padding
field.description: Padding to force alignment in GCS window

message.name: Heading rate to Rudder parameters
message.description: Set heading rate to rudder parameters

field.name: lowpass_frequency
field.description: cutoff frequency of the LPF applied to the input of the PID controller

field.name: padding
field.description: Padding to force alignment in GCS window

message.name: Standard Angle of Attack
message.description: Sets the pitch angle that is added to the input of the pitch controller

field.name: Trigger G-Force
field.description: What positive forward G-force the accelerometer must experience to trigger

field.name: Trigger Duration
field.description: How long the trigger G-force must be sustained for before the trigger is declared

field.name: Trigger Configuration

enum.choice: Start Motor Delay at End of Trigger

field.description: When to start the motor, relative to the trigger motion

field.name: Motor Start Delay
field.description: Seconds after trigger before motor starts

field.name: Motor Ramp Time
field.description: Seconds during which motor ramps from idle to full power

field.name: Climb Time
field.description: Seconds after motor starts for which the aircraft performs the climbout

field.name: Engage System
field.description: Turns the hand-launch system on or off

field.name: Yaw Limit
field.description: Maximum amount that the yaw controller can affect the motors

field.name: Scaler
field.description: Setting for algorithm that handles mixes with motors that go beyond min/max values

field.name: Min Output
field.description: Minimum output value for motors when copter is armed

field.name: % Throttle for 10% Thrust
field.description: Throttle in range [0, 100] for 10% thrust from propeller

field.name: % Throttle for 30% Thrust
field.description: Throttle in range [0, 100] for 30% thrust from propeller

field.name: % Throttle for 50% Thrust
field.description: Throttle in range [0, 100] for 50% thrust from propeller

field.name: % Throttle for 70% Thrust
field.description: Throttle in range [0, 100] for 70% thrust from propeller

field.name: % Throttle for 90% Thrust
field.description: Throttle in range [0, 100] for 90% thrust from propeller

field.name: % Throttle for 100% Thrust
field.description: Throttle in range [0, 100] for 100% thrust from propeller

field.name: Low Throttle PID Boost
field.description: How much to increase the effect of PIDs by when throttle is below 50%.

field.name: Max Pitch Rate
field.description: Pitch rotation rate in degrees/sec when input is at full deflection

field.name: Max Roll Rate
field.description: Roll rotation rate in degrees/sec when input is at full deflection

field.name: Max Yaw Rate
field.description: Yaw rotation rate in degrees/sec when input is at full deflection

field.name: Max Pitch
field.description: Pitch angle in degrees when input is at full deflection

field.name: Max Roll
field.description: Roll angle in degrees when input is at full deflection

field.name: Max Rotation Rate
field.description: Maximum angular rotation rate that the controller will request

field.name: Throttle Boost
field.description: How much to boost the throttle by to compensate for lean angle

field.name: Pitch Feed-Forward Coefficient
field.description: Coefficient applied to the calculated-rate to rate controller path.

field.name: Roll Feed-Forward Coefficient
field.description: Coefficient applied to the calculated-rate to rate controller path.

field.name: Hover Throttle
field.description: Average throttle needed for the copter to hover (microseconds)

field.name: Throttle Limit
field.description: Maximum distance throttle is allowed to move from center

field.name: Velocity Feed-Forward
field.description: How much the directly-specified velocity is injected into the control loop, which otherwise gets velocity from position PID

field.name: Acceleration Feed-Forward
field.description: How much the directly-specified acceleration (from the velocity controller) is sent to the throttle, which otherwise comes from acceleration PID

field.name: Max Angle
field.description: Maximum pitch or roll angle the controller will command

field.name: Velocity FeedForward
field.description: How much the output of the position controller is added to the output of the velocity controller

field.name: Acceleration FeedForward
field.description: How much the output of the rate controller is added to the output of the acceleration controller

field.name: Yaw Threshold
field.description: How close vehicle yaw must be to the path heading to start moving

field.name: Yaw Unlock Distance
field.description: When within this radius of the target, yaw control is unlocked to prevent excessive movement

field.name: Stop Velocity Threshold
field.description: The horizontal velocity in ft/sec that the aircraft must fall below in order to move on to the next waypoint.

field.name: Minimum Speed
field.description: Minimum airspeed and groundspeed necessary to declare flight

field.name: Minimum Altitude
field.description: Minimum altitude above ground level necessary to declare flight

field.name: Activation Time
field.description: Consecutive seconds for which the speed and altitude requirements must be met

field.name: Auto-Arm Enabled
field.description: If the flight detection-to-auto arm trigger is enabled

field.name: RTL Minimum Altitude
field.description: Minimum altitude the aircraft will rise to before moving to the home location and landing

field.name: Landing Final Altitude
field.description: Altitude at which descent will switch to the slower final descent speed and landing detection will begin

field.name: Landing Final Velocity
field.description: Vertical Velocity (positive) at which the final descent stage will run.

field.name: Disarm Throttle Threshold
field.description: The average throttle level must drop to this percentage of the minumum possible altitude controller output in order to detect a landing. Set to greater than 1 to disable landing detection.

field.name: Takeoff Position Release Altitude
field.description: When taking off in auto mode, the copter will rise vertically until this altitude, and then start normal navigation.

field.name: Active Weathervaning Coeff
field.description: Amount of roll to feed into yaw

field.name: ToFixed Complete Airspeed
field.description: Airspeed at which the multicopter motors will be shut off and the transistion completed

field.name: ToMulti Coast Airspeed
field.description: Aircraft will coast down to this airspeed, at which the multicopter motors will start and maintain level

field.name: ToMulti Complete Airspeed
field.description: Aircraft will coast down to this airspeed, at which the multicopter controller will be fully active

field.name: Forward Pitch to Propeller Coefficient
field.description: Uses the fixed-wing motor to help with forward motion. Degrees to Throttle %.

field.name: Forward Pitch to Forward Pitch Coefficient
field.description: Adjusts the scale of the copter's forward pitch output.

field.name: Elevator Trim in Quad Mode
field.description: Sets the fixed elevator position when in quad mode. Range -1 to 1.

field.name: Stall Prevention High Speed
field.description: Sets the airspeed at which the quadcopter rotors begin to add lift. Zero to disable.

field.name: Stall Prevention Low Speed
field.description: Sets the airspeed at which the quadcopter rotors reach full hover throttle.

field.name: To-Fixed Transition Spool-up Time
field.description: Ramps the throttle from zero up to full power over this many sections

field.name: Flare Speed for ToQuad
field.description: Degrees-per-second at which pitch is increased during the ToQuad transition

field.name: Flare Angle for ToQuad
field.description: Max angl that the vehicle will pitch to during the ToQuad transition

message.name: Manual Motor Command
message.description: Manual operates the individual multirotor motors

field.name: Duration
field.description: Duration that motor will run for (s)

field.name: Value
field.description: Value to send to the motor (us or float)

field.name: Slow Stop
field.description: If true, the motor will decelerate over several seconds

field.name: Increment Size
field.description: Percent to increase/decrease the parameter by

field.name: Number of Cycles
field.description: Number of successive increments to test

field.name: Use GPS
field.description: If yes, the aircraft will return to its starting position between each cycle

field.name: Vertical Motor Position
field.description: Output to the tiltrotor servo when the motors are vertical

field.name: Horizontal Motor Position
field.description: Output to the tiltrotor servo when the motors are horizontal

field.name: Forward Pitch to Tiltrotor Coefficient
field.description: Adjusts the rotor tilt to help with forward motion. Degrees to Degrees.

field.name: Forward Pitch to Forward Pitch Coefficient
field.description: Adjusts the scale of the copter's forward pitch output.

field.name: Maximum Tilt Angle
field.description: Adjusts the maximum angle of rotation before transition

field.name: Stall Speed
field.description: Adjusts the stall speed for specific aircraft to be used for transition

field.name: Stall Speed Coeff for F2Q
field.description: (Stall speed * this) will be used as the threshold for completing a fixed-to-quad transition

field.name: Tilt Angular Velocity
field.description: Adjusts the rotational speed of transition

field.name: Flare Speed for ToQuad
field.description: Degrees-per-second at which pitch is increased during the ToQuad transition

field.name: Flare Angle for ToQuad
field.description: Max angl that the vehicle will pitch to during the ToQuad transition

field.name: Input Channel
field.description: Which channel (RC or FCS depending on mode) to get data from

field.name: Output Channel
field.description: Which output channel to write to

field.name: Gain
field.description: How much (positive or negative) to multiple the channel by (percentage, 100 = no change)

field.name: Active in Manual
field.description: Is this rule applied when in manual mode?

field.name: Active in Non-Manual
field.description: Is this rule applied when in normal (fcs) mode?

field.name: Mixing Operation
field.description: How is this rule applied on top of the current value for the output channel?

field.name: Enabled
field.description: Is this rule processed or skipped?

field.name: Input Channel
field.description: Which channel (RC or FCS depending on mode) to get data from

field.description: Which output channel to write to

field.description: How much (positive or negative) to multiple the channel by (percentage, 100 = no change)

field.description: Is this rule processed or skipped?

field.name: Gain
field.description: How much (positive or negative) to multiple the channel by (percentage, 100 = no change)

field.name: Active in Manual
field.description: Is this rule applied when in manual mode?

field.name: Active in Non-Manual
field.description: Is this rule applied when in normal (fcs) mode?

field.name: Mixing Operation
field.description: How is this rule applied on top of the current value for the output channel?

field.name: Enabled
field.description: Is this rule processed or skipped?

field.description: Which channel (RC or FCS depending on mode) to get data from

field.name: Servo Reversed
field.description: True to reverse the servo direction

field.name: Center Position
field.description: What output value centers the tilt servo, in [-1, 1]

field.name: Angle Range
field.description: What range of angles is covered as the servo goes from 1000 to 2000 PWM, in degrees

field.name: Slew rate
field.description: The servo's normal velocity, in degrees/second

field.name: Vertical Thrust Compensation
field.description: How much to adjust the rear motor to compensate for tilt angle

field.name: Horizontal Thrust Compensation
field.description: How much to adjust the tilt angle to compensate for motor speed

field.name: Pitch Servo Type
field.description: What type of servo is installed on the pitch axis

field.name: Yaw Servo Type
field.description: What type of servo is installed on the yaw axis

message.name: Obstacle Field Command
message.description: Set N nodes of an obstacles

count.name: number_of_nodes
count.description: The number of nodes in obstacle

field.name: airspeed
field.description: The airspeed [knots] for the search task

field.name: altitude
field.description: The altitude [ft] for the search task

count.name: number_of_waypoints
count.description: The number of waypoints in search task

field.name: loiter_time
field.description: The loiter time for the waypoint if loiter_mode is time

field.name: airspeed
field.description: The airspeed [knots] for the surveilance task

field.name: altitude
field.description: The altitude [ft] for the surveilance task

field.name: duration
field.description: The duration [seconds] the surveilance should last

count.name: number_of_waypoints
count.description: The number of waypoints in search task

field.name: loiter_time
field.description: The loiter time for the waypoint if loiter_mode is time
